Package payrollObjects

Class Parttime

java.lang.Object
payrollObjects.Employee
payrollObjects.Parttime
public class Parttime
extends Employee
Extends the Employee class and includes specific data and operations to a part time employee. Part time employees contain an hourly pay rate and an amount of hours worked. Parttime employees can be paid overtime for the ranges 81 to 100 hours (inclusive).
Author:
Matthew Brandao, Armit Patel

  • Constructor Details

    • Parttime

      public Parttime​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String department, Date dateHired, int hoursWorked)
      Creates an instance of Parttime. A Parttime employee is also an instance of Employee.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the part time employee
      department - department the part time employee belongs to
      dateHired - the date the part time employee was hired
      hoursWorked - the hours the part time employee worked

    • Parttime

      public Parttime​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String department, Date dateHired, double hourlyRate)
      Creates an instance of Parttime. A Parttime employee is also an instance of Employee.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the part time employee
      department - department the part time employee belongs to
      dateHired - the date the part time employee was hired
      hourlyRate - the hourly rate the part time employee gets paid

  • Method Details

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Compares the profile of two part time employees.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Employee
      Returns:
      true if the part time employees share the same profile, false if the profiles are different or the parameter is not an instance of Parttime

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Creates string representation of a part time employee's attributes with their hourly rate and hours worked. Parttime's attributes also contains Employee's attributes.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Employee
      Returns:
      string representation of Employee and Parttime

    • calculatePayment

      public void calculatePayment()
      Calculates the payment for a part time employee by finding the product of the hours worked and the hourly rate of the part time employee. Overtime calculations are handled by this function.
      Overrides:
      calculatePayment in class Employee

    • getHoursWorked

      public int getHoursWorked()
      Get the hours the part time employee has worked.
      Returns:
      the hours worked

    • getHourlyRate

      public double getHourlyRate()
      Get the hourly rate the part time employee gets paid.
      Returns:
      the hourly rate

    • setHoursWorked

      public void setHoursWorked​(int hoursWorked)
      Sets the hours the part time employee has worked.
      Parameters:
      hoursWorked - the hours worked to set
